undistort
=========

.. py:module:: undistort






Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: undistort_img(img, intrinsic)

   Undistort image using intrinsic parameters.

   :param img: Image to undistort
   :type img: np.ndarray
   :param intrinsic: Intrinsic parameters
   :type intrinsic: dict

   :returns: Undistorted image
   :rtype: undistorted_img (np.ndarray)


.. py:function:: undistort_points(pts, intrinsic)

.. py:function:: remap_corners(corners, cammtx, dist_coef, sn, img=None)
